text:
MEMORANDUM
April 9. 1958
To: Members of NAEB Board of Directors
Jack McBride
Haskell Boyter
Robert Coleman
E. ko Hungerford
Vernon Bronson
William Harley
Richard Vogl
Robert Schehkkan
Edwin Adams
Prank E* Schooleyi-â– 
Gertrude Broderick *
Harry J* Skomia
From: Burton Paulu
As you already know* the Board meeting in connection
with the BBT will be at 10:00 a.m, Sunday morning. May 11,
with meetings to continue that afternoon and evening*
This is a reminder of the date of the meeting, and also
an invitation to make suggestions for the agenda* Please
send these items to me as soon as possible*
